text: Dance freak , gym lover first year wingie  per jyada jan nhi paye us time ye afsos rhega . Dance freak , gym boyKaafi late se samajh mai aaya ki dil ka kitna saaf hai tu . Khud ke exam ki preparation bachi ho phir bhi padha diya krta tha mujhe . Exam time mai library mate aur baaki time masti . From playing cricket to going class together , itne saari chije apan sath mai kiye hain . Per tu mujhe gym jane ke liye motivate nhi kr ska...xD.  Abhi to waise ek sal bacha hai milke aur maje krne hain abhi to . Milte hai college mai waps se hopefully . Wish you great time ahead.
author: Atul  Kumar

text: Multi tasking , highly disciplined , Punctuality , Vivid learner aur many more good things  to learn from you . You were and will always be inspiration for all of us . Room se alag hi positive vibes aati thi . Mai hmesha sochta tha hmlog ko sath itne masti krne ke baad bhi itna kaise padh leta .  Time management alag level ka .  My go-to-person for every small problem . Waise ye achchhi chij hai ki ek sal aur sikhne ko milega tmse . Aise hi padhte rho , IAS bano aur bachcho ko padhne ke liye motivate krte rho .
author: Atul  Kumar

text: Bhai bhai . One of the few guys I met when I came to O1batch in Allen . Hard working , Helpful , Charming guy  .I had great time together with you . Aise hi aage badhte rho . Wish you a great time ahead.
author: Atul  Kumar

text: One of the most studious , hard working , disciplined guy I have ever met . Aise hi padhte rho aur sabko inspire krte rho . Wish you a great time ahead.
author: Atul  Kumar

text: Kitna lucky hu n mai ki mera jo sabse phle dost bna IITK , wo sabse genuine tha . Itna positive banda nhi dekha maine ajtak . Kash tera jaisa positive ho jata mai bhi . First year mai itni achchhi aur deep cheejen btayi tune ki kitni cheejen to aj jake samajh mai aati kikya bolna chah rha tha tu . Itna support sayad hi muje kisi se mil pata jitna tumne diya . From trying to push beyond limit to making me happy when I became too sad , you have given me every support i needed to become a better person . Aise hi positivity spread krta reh . Abhi to ek saal aur sath mai rhna hai to aram se maje kkrenge sath mai abhi to aur . Wish you a great time ahead.
author: Atul  Kumar
